module.name: Search
module.param: index=_internal | head 1000 | stats count by sourcetype date_second

module.name: HTML
module.param: test this case by going to page 2. The downstream modules should close up and not re-request.

module.name: HTML
module.param:
sourcetype = $row.fields.sourcetype$
sourcetype (raw) = $row.fields.sourcetype.rawValue$
count = $row.fields.count$
count (raw)= $row.fields.count.rawValue$

row.searchTerms = $row.searchTerms$

row.cell0.name = $row.cell0.name$
row.cell0.value = $row.cell0.value$
row.cell0.rawValue = $row.cell0.rawValue$

row.cell1.name = $row.cell1.name$
row.cell1.value = $row.cell1.value$
row.cell1.rawValue = $row.cell1.rawValue$

row.value = $row.value$
row.rawValue = $row.rawValue$
row.name = $row.name$

row.modifierKey = $row.modifierKey$

module.name: Search
module.group: no row highlighted - one default not present
module.param: index=_internal | head 1000 | stats count by sourcetype | eval user="my sourcetype is " + sourcetype

module.name: HTML
module.param:
sourcetype = $row.fields.sourcetype$
sourcetype (raw) = $row.fields.sourcetype.rawValue$
count = $row.fields.count$ (should not be present since there was no row matched)
user = $row.fields.user$
not_present = $row.fields.not_present$

module.name: Search
module.param: index=_internal source=*scheduler* OR source=*splunkd* OR source=*metrics* | head 1000 | stats count by sourcetype source

module.name: Search
module.param: index=_internal | head 1000 | stats count by sourcetype date_second

module.name: HTML
module.param: test this case by going to page 2 with firebug open. The search for the downstream modules should not dispatch. On returning to page 1, the downstream modules shoudl reppear and their search should redispatch

module.name: Search
module.param: index=_* OR index=* sourcetype=$row.fields.sourcetype$ | stats count by sourcetype

module.name: Search
module.param: index=_internal source=*scheduler* OR source=*splunkd* OR source=*metrics* | head 1000 | stats count by sourcetype | sort sourcetype

module.name: HTML
module.param: default.sourcetype specifies splunkd_access. selectedIndex specifies "1". selectedIndex should win.
